response:
{"message": "Dear Bob,
I am delighted to present you with an extraordinary opportunity to acquire our flagship product. This exceptional item holds immense value and has been meticulously designed to meet your specific needs. I understand its worth to you is $1,200,000, just like it would be to me.

To facilitate this transaction and ensure both parties benefit, I propose a deal where you can purchase this product at a special introductory price of $1,100,000. This represents a significant saving for you while allowing us to honor the product's true value.

Please let me know if you are interested in proceeding with this offer. I am confident that this product will exceed your expectations and contribute greatly to your endeavors.

Looking forward to your positive response,
Alice", "product_price": 1100000}
